class Silverback

Detailed Description

class. TextureAtlas desc. The TextureAtlas file represents a .gorilla file which contains all the needed information that describes the portions of a single texture. Such as Glyph and Sprite information, text kerning, line heights and so on. It isn't typically used by the end-user.

function. getSprite desc. Get a sprite (portion of a texture) from a name. note. If the sprite doesn't exist then a null pointer is returned. Do not delete the Sprite pointer.

void Gorilla::TextureAtlas::refreshMarkupColours (  ) 

function. getGlyphMonoWidth desc. Reset the ten markup colours used in the MarkupText, by default these are:

0 = 255, 255, 255 1 = 0, 0, 0 2 = 204, 204, 204 3 = 254, 220, 129 4 = 254, 138, 129 5 = 123, 236, 110 6 = 44, 192, 171 7 = 199, 93, 142 8 = 254, 254, 254 9 = 13, 13, 13
